pageContext.claim: “Millions of American families -- and I mean millions -- continue to suffer from Obamacare while congressional Democrats obstruct our efforts to rescue them.  And I'll tell you, that's exactly what’s happening.”
pageContext.analysis: About 20 million people gained health insurance under the Affordable Care Act, a fact Trump never mentions as he highlights anecdotal stories of people he claims have suffered under the law. Trump casts blame on Democrats for his troubles passing a replacement, but Republicans have not tried to enlist Democratic support.
